item.description: Buy cheap meat, and lots of it.
Assorted fish, ready for the barbecue.
More expensive meat, but also much tastier.
Assorted biologically acceptable meats.
Meat replacements only, vegetarian hamburgers etcetera.
No meat at all.
Soda, lemonade and the likes only. No alcoholic beverages.
Beer, wine and soda.
Biological beer. Yes, it exists.
Expensive alcoholic stuff. Good wine and beer.
Someone's balcony. Has just enough space and is easy to reach, but hidden in shade.
An open place in the woods. Plenty of room there, little chance of disturbances, but hard to reach.
A reservable spot in the Park. Close to everyone, but very busy in this season.
Barbecue on the beach. Furthest of all locations, requires a permit but has a fantastic atmosphere.
No vegetables. Why bother, it's a barbecue.
Cheap vegetables. Anything that's 50% off will do.
Good vegetables. A little more work for preparation and cutting.
Prepared vegetables. For those who do not want to cut, at some extra cost.
Excellent vegetables. Go all out with stuffed bell peppers, tomato specials, very good salads etcetera.
Disposable barbecue. Cheap, but can only be used once
The standard barbecue. Coles not included.
Gas barbecue. Can even be used inside. Durable and expensive.
